creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
description: four girls, seen from back, with their hair in pairs of buns, wearing blankets over their shoulders, standing and seated on top of an adobe structure, with steps at left, looking down
inscription:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in brown: [Plate 405]
signed: in lower margin, printed in brown: [WATCHING THE DANCERS  From Copyright Photograph 1906 by E.S. Curtis  Photogravure Suffolk Eng. Co. Boston]
title: Watching the Dancers
